snippet: Ms. Guy, a Caribbean-born novelist, was widely considered one of the 20th century’s most distinguished writers for young adults.
abstract: Rosa Guy, Caribbean-born writer known for her unflinchingly direct novels for young people about black life in urban America, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Guy, a Caribbean-born novelist, was widely considered one of the 20th century’s most distinguished writers for young adults.

headline.seo: Rosa Guy, 89, Author of Forthright Novels for Young People
headline.main: Rosa Guy, 89, Author of Forthright Novels for Young People, Dies
headline.print_headline: Rosa Guy, 89, Author of Forthright Novels for Young People
